name: Nova Drift
description: Nova Drift distills the mechanical depth and strategy of an action RPG into classic arcade space combat. Control an endlessly evolving bio-mechanical ship, face legions of strange and deadly foes, and ride the wake of a dying star across the void.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1 Ghz CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space
